content:
That's wonderful! Congratulations to your cousin Rachel and her new spouse! It's always a joy to celebrate love and new beginnings with family and friends. Weddings are such special occasions, filled with happiness, tears, and unforgettable memories.

I'm sure you must have had a great time catching up with your cousin and other family members, and enjoying the festivities. Did you have a favorite part of the wedding, like a special song, a heartfelt speech, or a fun dance move?

(By the way, I'm happy to chat about your cousin's wedding, but I don't retain any personal information or memories, so feel free to share as much or as little as you'd like!)
